PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-14192024-12-20PMO
ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder Terminating the Assignment of the Honourable Ginette Petitpas Taylor and Assigning the Honourable Rachel Bendayan to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage and the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness
PrecisTerminate the assignment of the Honourable GINETTE PETITPAS TAYLOR made by Order in Council P.C. 2024-1232 of November 21, 2024; and assigns the Honourable RACHEL BENDAYAN, Minister of State (Official Languages) to be styled Minister of Official Languages and Associate Minister of Public Safety, to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage in the carrying out of htat Minister's responsibilities; and assigns the Honourable RACHEL BENDAYAN, Minister of State (Public Safety) to be styled Minister of Official Languages and Associate Minister of Public Safety, to assist the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Prepardness in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2025-0008 Publication Date: 2025-01-15
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Terminate the assignment of the Honourable GINETTE PETITPAS TAYLOR made by Order in Council P.C. 2024-1232 of November 21, 2024; and assigns the Honourable RACHEL BENDAYAN, Minister of State (Official Languages) to be styled Minister of Official Languages and Associate Minister of Public Safety, to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage in the carrying out of htat Minister's responsibilities; and assigns the Honourable RACHEL BENDAYAN, Minister of State (Public Safety) to be styled Minister of Official Languages and Associate Minister of Public Safety, to assist the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Prepardness in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities.
